sense.gloss: occupation, profession, job, vocation, trade, calling, business
one's post, place of work, workplace
employment separation, leaving one's job, losing one's job
side job (outside of one's main employment), side gig, side hustle
part job (carried out at home), home industry
(secretly) working on something unrelated to the class (or conference, etc.) one is attending
agency (government department between a ministry and a bureau under the ritsuryō system)
sacred profession, holy orders, vocation, ministry

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑職務↑↓しょくむ↓↑怠慢↑↓たいまん↓の↑申↑↓もう↓し↑開↑↓ひら↓きをしなければならない。

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はその↑職↑↓しょく↓に↑応募↑↓おうぼ↓すべきだ。
sdata.e: You should apply for that post.

sdata.j: ご↑職業↑↓しょくぎょう↓は↑何↑↓なん↓ですか。

sdata.e: Nowadays jobs are hard to come by.
